characters: A child on the right side of the road, a pedestrian on the left side of the road, a cyclist on the right side of the road, and multiple vehicles.
summary: The video sequence shows a vehicle driving through a busy urban area at night. There are multiple vehicles on the road, including a black car on the left side and a white car on the right side. A child suddenly appears from the right side of the road, darting into the driving lane. This is a clear case of 'ghost probing' as the child was hidden by the parked vehicles and other obstructions until the moment of emergence, creating an immediate collision risk.
actions: The child on the right side of the road suddenly darts into the driving lane, creating an immediate danger. The pedestrian on the left side of the road and the cyclist on the right side of the road are moving along the roadside.
key_objects: Vehicles on the left and right sides of the road, a child darting into the driving lane, a pedestrian on the left side of the road, and a cyclist on the right side of the road.
